_header: O blessed Lady Christs Mother dear
_description: John Lydgate, Verses for the coronation of Henry VI, written to accompany the second course — one eight-line stanza

PierpontM775.First Lines:
O blessid lady cristes modre dereAnd yow seynt George y callid hire
                    knyght…
PierpontM775.Last Lines:
…Borne bi dissent and title of rightIustely to regne in
                    engelonde & ffraunce
